edu.cross.ucsc.hse.core.jfchart

Class RendererProperties

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cross.ucsc.hse.core.jfchart.RendererProperties

  • public class RendererProperties
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines general properties that determine how the data in a chart will be displayed. Tbese properties can be used to assign specific colors and patterns to object sets in order to distinguish them.
    Author:
    beshort
